short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track time during screensharing in the webbrowser. Useful for use with evernote, Excel Online or a Github codereview.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Toolbar Timer helps to track Time during a Screenshare Meeting. 

Meetings can be quite long, because there is no time pressure to create the result on time, a simple progress bar is an intuitive reminder of the Meeting Timeframe. It helps focusing on the agenda without drifting off.
